summary: Build a modern, professional, recruiter-focused portfolio website for AI & Data Science undergraduate Vaibhav Gaikwad with a dark futuristic theme, responsive layout, smooth scrolling animations, and sections for hero, about, skills, projects, intro video placeholder, resume download, certifications, contact form, and footer.
architectural_notes: Use dark theme with blue/purple gradient accents and clean futuristic styling.
Ensure fully responsive design suitable for campus placement/recruiter viewing.
Include smooth scrolling animations for section transitions.
Structure Projects section to render from a single data source (e.g., JSON/TS array) to allow adding/removing projects by editing data only.

existing_features.title: Create a fully responsive, modern portfolio single-page layout with a dark theme and blue/purple gradient accents, using a clean futuristic AI-focused visual style consistently across all sections.
Implement a sticky top navigation with smooth scrolling to sections: Hero, About, Skills, Projects, Video, Resume, Certifications, Contact; highlight the active section while scrolling.

Build the Hero section with: large name 'Vaibhav Gaikwad', subtitle 'AI & Data Science Undergraduate | Building Intelligent Systems', tagline 'Transforming data into smart solutions using ML and LLMs', a primary CTA button labeled 'View Projects' that scrolls to Projects, and a modern AI/tech visual background.
Add an About Me section that displays the provided professional summary text verbatim in a clean, readable layout.
Create a Skills section with categorized badge-style lists for Programming, AI / ML, Web, and Tools, using the exact skill items provided.
Create a Projects section with four professional project cards; each card shows title, description, tech stack chips, and a GitHub link using the exact URLs provided.
Add an 'Introduction Video' section with a clear title and a styled video placeholder area reserved for future upload (no external video integration required).

Add a Resume section with a clean card layout and a 'Download Resume' button; if no resume file is present yet, the UI must still behave gracefully (e.g., show 'Coming soon' state or an inline message).
Add a Certifications section listing the two provided certifications in a professional layout (list or cards).

Add a Contact section that displays email, LinkedIn, and GitHub (using the exact values/URLs provided) and includes a simple contact form (name, email, message). Submitting the form should provide a client-side confirmation and can use a mailto flow or copy-to-clipboard (no third-party email service).
Add a minimal dark footer containing social icons/links (GitHub, LinkedIn, Email) and the exact copyright text: '© 2026 Vaibhav Gaikwad'.
Add subtle, performant scroll-triggered animations across sections (e.g., fade/slide in) and smooth anchor scrolling, ensuring accessibility (prefers-reduced-motion respected).

Refactor the Projects section so the list of projects is data-driven from a dedicated exported data module (instead of being defined inline inside `frontend/src/components/portfolio/ProjectsSection.tsx`), making it straightforward to add more projects by editing a single list.

Add clear inline documentation (code comments) in the projects data module explaining the required fields for a project entry (title, description, tech array, GitHub URL) and providing a copy-pasteable example entry.
Update the site footer copyright line to display the exact text "© 2026 Vaibhav Gaikwad" (not a dynamic year) to match the portfolio requirements before publishing.

Add a repo-level publishing/deployment guide (e.g., DEPLOYMENT.md) that documents the steps to build and deploy the app to the Internet Computer using the existing project setup (frontend + single Motoko canister).

new_feature_requests.summary: Implement dark, futuristic AI-focused portfolio website theme with blue/purple gradient accents and fully responsive layout
Create Hero section with name, subtitle, tagline, CTA 'View Projects', and modern AI/tech background
Add About Me section with provided professional summary text
Add Skills section with categorized badge-style lists (Programming, AI/ML, Web, Tools)
Add Projects section with professional project cards (4 projects) including title, description, tech stack, and GitHub links
Add Intro Video section with placeholder for future video upload
Add Resume section with clean card layout and 'Download Resume' button
Add Certifications section listing specified certifications
Add Contact section with email/LinkedIn/GitHub and a simple contact form
Add minimal dark footer with social icons and copyright © 2026 Vaibhav Gaikwad
Add smooth scrolling animations across the site for a polished modern feel
Make Projects section easily extensible (data-driven) so more projects can be added without rewriting layout
